definition.value: Success: You have modified order statuses!
Warning: You do not have permission to modify order statues!
Order Status Name must be between 2 and 32 characters!
Warning: This order status cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned as the default store order status!
Warning: This order status cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned as the default download status!
Warning: This order status cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned to %s stores!
Warning: This order status cannot be deleted as it is currently assigned to %s orders!
Warning: This is important order status that is linked to payments. You can not delete this status.
Order Status Text Id must be Unique and between 2 and 32 characters!
